Seems to be well made, so I expect to wear these for a long time! I have to control myself to keep from having an entire closet of them to wear to work every day.

评论概述: Well made but a LOT of fabric in sleeves
评论详情: I have similar blouses that I love that have 3/4 length sleeves, so I thought I'd get some with short sleeves.  I had to return these because the short sleeves were so bulky, they were not flattering at all on my apple shape. I would steer clear from this short sleeve version, if your upper torso is where you carry some extra weight.  Otherwise, the material is nice and I believe the shirt is well made.  I wish it had worked for me.
Sleek fabric, light weight, great fit and beautiful colors.

评论概述: Great for the summer and Great for work
评论详情: Love this, the fit is great, the color is a beautiful. Great with work slacks and jeans. Days have been super hot and the fabric breathes well.

The blouse is really nice,  it's a cool blouse. I sent mine back though.  I have a curve at my waist line so I like to wear shirts that accent it....especially since my butt isn't like I would like it to look.  For a figure that is more straight or don't care about the sway at the waist it is a really pretty blouse. It's fancy but could wear it to church, and work too.

I ordered this blouse in the wrong size and have to order it in a smaller size - not sure if it runs big but regardless, I really like it.  It looks just like the photo and the fabric is very nice - you could dress it up or wear it with jeans.  If the next size down fits me I will definitely be ordering more than one - so many beautiful colors and patterns to choose from.
I have gotten many compliments. It was just what I needed to add to my wardrobe.

I’m a short woman and over 150lbs and this blouse fit extremely well. It doesn’t hug my torso but does flatter my midsection. The collar is not touching my throat, the end of the sleeves end at my elbows (I have short arms too). It is a bit sheer but once on it covers modestly. It is mid weight so it doesn’t feel like a thin fast fashion item. I felt a bit like Stevie Nicks, to be sure, turning about in the blouse. Will definitely look at adding more of this item to my wardrobe.
It is so soft and comfortable, and it seems to be true to size. I would highly recommend it.
Lightweight and comfortable.  It goes in just a bit at the waist so it doesn't make you look square, which I am.
Very comfortable, looks great. Easy to wash.
